verses.verse: But now thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> that created <WH1254> <WH8802> thee, O Ya`akov <WH3290>, and he that formed <WH3335> <WH8802> thee, O Yisra'EL <WH3478>, Fear <WH3372> <WH8799> not: for I have redeemed <WH1350> <WH8804> thee, I have called <WH7121> <WH8804> thee by thy name <WH8034>; thou art mine.

When thou passest through <WH5674> <WH8799> the waters <WH4325>, I will be with thee; and through the rivers <WH5104>, they shall not overflow <WH7857> <WH8799> thee: when thou walkest <WH3212> <WH8799> through <WH1119> the fire <WH784>, thou shalt not be burned <WH3554> <WH8735>; neither shall the flame <WH3852> kindle <WH1197> <WH8799> upon thee.

For I am the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, HaKadosh <WH6918> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, thy Saviour <WH3467> <WH8688>: I gave <WH5414> <WH8804> Egypt <WH4714> for thy ransom <WH3724>, Ethiopia <WH3568> and Seba <WH5434> for thee.

Since thou wast precious <WH3365> <WH8804> in my sight <WH5869>, thou hast been honourable <WH3513> <WH8738>, and I have loved <WH157> <WH8804> thee: therefore will I give <WH5414> <WH8799> men <WH120> for thee, and people <WH3816> for thy life <WH5315>.
Fear <WH3372> <WH8799> not: for I am with thee: I will bring <WH935> <WH8686> thy seed <WH2233> from the east <WH4217>, and gather <WH6908> <WH8762> thee from the west <WH4628>;

I will say <WH559> <WH8799> to the north <WH6828>, Give up <WH5414> <WH8798>; and to the south <WH8486>, Keep not back <WH3607> <WH8799>: bring <WH935> <WH8685> my sons <WH1121> from far <WH7350>, and my daughters <WH1323> from the ends <WH7097> of the earth <WH776>;

Havahn every one <WH3605> that is called <WH7121> <WH8737> by my name <WH8034>: for I have created <WH1254> <WH8804> him for my glory <WH3519>, I have formed <WH3335> <WH8804> him; yea, I have made <WH6213> <WH8804> him.
Bring forth <WH3318> <WH8685> the blind <WH5787> people <WH5971> that have <WH3426> eyes <WH5869>, and the deaf <WH2795> that have ears <WH241>.

Let all the nations <WH1471> be gathered <WH6908> <WH8738> together <WH3162>, and let the people <WH3816> be assembled <WH622> <WH8735>: who among them can declare <WH5046> <WH8686> this, and shew <WH8085> <WH8686> us former things <WH7223>? let them bring forth <WH5414> <WH8799> their witnesses <WH5707>, that they may be justified <WH6663> <WH8799>: or let them hear <WH8085> <WH8799>, and say <WH559> <WH8799>, It is truth <WH571>.

Ye are my witnesses <WH5707>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>, and my servant <WH5650> whom I have chosen <WH977> <WH8804>: that ye may know <WH3045> <WH8799> and believe <WH539> <WH8686> me, and understand <WH995> <WH8799> that I am he: before <WH6440> me there was no 'Elohim <WH410> formed <WH3335> <WH8738>, neither shall there be after <WH310> me.
I, even I, am the YY <WH3068>; and beside <WH1107> me there is no saviour <WH3467> <WH8688>.

I have declared <WH5046> <WH8689>, and have saved <WH3467> <WH8689>, and I have shewed <WH8085> <WH8689>, when there was no strange <WH2114> <WH8801> god among you: therefore ye are my witnesses <WH5707>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>, that I am 'Elohim <WH410>.
Yea, before the day <WH3117> was I am he; and there is none that can deliver <WH5337> <WH8688> out of my hand <WH3027>: I will work <WH6466> <WH8799>, and who shall let <WH7725> <WH8686> it?

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>, your redeemer <WH1350> <WH8802>, HaKadosh <WH6918> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>; For your sake I have sent <WH7971> <WH8765> to Babylon <WH894>, and have brought down <WH3381> <WH8689> all their nobles <WH1281>, and the Chaldeans <WH3778>, whose cry <WH7440> is in the ships <WH591>.
I am the YY <WH3068>, your Holy One <WH6918>, the creator <WH1254> <WH8802> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, your King <WH4428>.
Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>, which maketh <WH5414> <WH8802> a way <WH1870> in the sea <WH3220>, and a path <WH5410> in the mighty <WH5794> waters <WH4325>;

Which bringeth forth <WH3318> <WH8688> the chariot <WH7393> and horse <WH5483>, the army <WH2428> and the power <WH5808>; they shall lie down <WH7901> <WH8799> together <WH3162>, they shall not rise <WH6965> <WH8799>: they are extinct <WH1846> <WH8804>, they are quenched <WH3518> <WH8804> as tow <WH6594>.
Remember <WH2142> <WH8799> ye not the former things <WH7223>, neither consider <WH995> <WH8709> the things of old <WH6931>.

Behold, I will do <WH6213> <WH8802> a new thing <WH2319>; now it shall spring forth <WH6779> <WH8799>; shall ye not know <WH3045> <WH8799> it? I will even make <WH7760> <WH8799> a way <WH1870> in the wilderness <WH4057>, and rivers <WH5104> in the desert <WH3452>.

The beast <WH2416> of the field <WH7704> shall honour <WH3513> <WH8762> me, the dragons <WH8577> and the owls <WH1323> <WH3284>: because I give <WH5414> <WH8804> waters <WH4325> in the wilderness <WH4057>, and rivers <WH5104> in the desert <WH3452>, to give drink <WH8248> <WH8687> to my people <WH5971>, my chosen <WH972>.
This <WH2098> people <WH5971> have I formed <WH3335> <WH8804> for myself; they shall shew forth <WH5608> <WH8762> my praise <WH8416>.
But thou hast not called <WH7121> <WH8804> upon me, O Ya`akov <WH3290>; but thou hast been weary <WH3021> <WH8804> of me, O Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

Thou hast not brought <WH935> <WH8689> me the small cattle <WH7716> of thy burnt offerings <WH5930>; neither hast thou honoured <WH3513> <WH8765> me with thy sacrifices <WH2077>. I have not caused thee to serve <WH5647> <WH8689> with an offering <WH4503>, nor wearied <WH3021> <WH8689> thee with incense <WH3828>.

Thou hast bought <WH7069> <WH8804> me no sweet cane <WH7070> with money <WH3701>, neither hast thou filled <WH7301> <WH8689> me with the fat <WH2459> of thy sacrifices <WH2077>: but thou hast made me to serve <WH5647> <WH8689> with thy sins <WH2403>, thou hast wearied <WH3021> <WH8689> me with thine iniquities <WH5771>.
I, even I, am he that blotteth out <WH4229> <WH8802> thy transgressions <WH6588> for mine own sake, and will not remember <WH2142> <WH8799> thy sins <WH2403>.
Put me in remembrance <WH2142> <WH8685>: let us plead <WH8199> <WH8735> together <WH3162>: declare <WH5608> <WH8761> thou, that thou mayest be justified <WH6663> <WH8799>.
Thy first <WH7223> father <WH1> hath sinned <WH2398> <WH8804>, and thy teachers <WH3887> <WH8688> have transgressed <WH6586> <WH8804> against me.

Therefore I have profaned <WH2490> <WH8762> the princes <WH8269> of the sanctuary <WH6944>, and have given <WH5414> <WH8799> Ya`akov <WH3290> to the curse <WH2764>, and Yisra'EL <WH3478> to reproaches <WH1421>.
